text: 14.22: Mt 7.14; FG 11.23; 15.32; 18.23; 1 Te 3.3Mani vergap, mani mba Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, mani maam mbe ndavi khavav, mbe ndavi havhari buni mbe nzuai. Mani mbe nzuav kama havharar khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui tɨv, nde guigira ana suirav, havhargiri. Nza Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga ŋgun ŋgirɨ saŋv, nza fharav simtɨgi vhɨrve ki tuav, nza ana ŋgɨgɨrga.”
